sense.def:
Dare
uporabljamo kot samostojen ali nepravi naklonski glagol. Kadar človek
dares to do something
, ima dovolj poguma, da nekaj stori.

seg.quote: She did not dare to look at him.
He dared not show that he was pleased.
I can't do that—I simply wouldn't dare.

sense.def:
To dare someone to do something
pomeni nekomu predlagati, naj nekaj stori, da bi dokazal svoj pogum.

seg.quote: He looked round fiercely, daring them to contradict.

sense.def:
A dare
je izziv, naj storimo nekaj nevarnega ali strašljivega.

seg.quote: It was many years since James had accepted a dare.

sense.def:
Don't you dare
rečemo, kadar nekomu jezno ukažemo, naj nečesa ne stori.

seg.quote: Don't you dare throw it away.

sense.def:
I dare say
ali
I daresay
rečemo, če hočemo povedati, da je nekaj po našem mnenju verjetno res.

seg.quote: I daresay you've spent all your money by now.
